title: GSX Airports
description:
I got tired of adding airports to GSX one at a time so I wrote this program to  
enable me to add many airports to GSX, FSX Ground Services, at one time. I liked it so I thought I will share it with you guys as a thank you for your sharing.

1) Run the .msi file.
2) Locate your GSX airports folder. Usually in Microsoft GamesMicrosoft Flight Simulator Xfsdreamteamcouatlgsxairports.
3) make sure that in there is a file named __init__.pye
4) Add as many ICAO codes in the textbox on the right side.
5) click Add button.

Enjoy.
